mainDescription: It is the best choice for a night out in Glasgow. The Genting Casino offers a stylish gaming experience with renowned croupier tables and the latest in slot machines as well as other electronic games. Check out regularly for special events and seasonal tournaments.
secondaryDescription: Sip in style and have a fresh cocktail, soft drinks, gins, and more. Or try its delicious menu including stone-baked pizzas, burgers, curries, and more tasty snacks and dishes. Step inside for a mesmerizing experience attended by a pleasant and most helpful staff.

info.address: 506/516 Sauchiehall Street, Glasgow G2 3LW, United Kingdom.

facilities.title: Food & Drink
content: Enjoy a buzzing atmosphere at the Genting’s Late Bar, or if you are craving for something delicious, its menu has a mix of fabulous flavors to suit everyone’s taste buds.

facilities.title: Rooftop
content: No rooftop area is available, but the private gaming rooms and opulent interiors offer a lavish experience.

facilities.title: Live Shows
content: Features occasional live performances, and offers private karaoke rooms for private parties.

facilities.title: Business Meetings
content: Not quite the best place for a business meeting, but the Genting provides few options for special parties.

facilities.title: My Genting Rewards
content: Earn points on your visits and get exclusive benefits by joining My Genting Rewards programme.

info.dressCode: Smart casual is fine, and jeans and smart trainers are acceptable. However, football shirts, muscle/vest tops are not allowed. Caps and other hats are also not allowed for the security and safety of the casinos’ guests.
info.ageRestrictions: Guests must be 18 or older, adhering to strict UK laws.
